newsitems.title: The Showcase for the free Title Update 1 is here!
newsitems.author: capcomjapan_marketing
newsitems.contents:
The release date and details of Free Title Update 1 were revealed in the latest Monster Hunter Wilds Showcase.
Release Date: Friday April 4, 2025 (UTC)

[h3][b]Monster Hunter Wilds - Free Title Update 1[/b][/h3]
[previewyoutube=T6y-0sBUKGI;full][/previewyoutube]
[h3][b]Monster Hunter Wilds Showcase | March 2025[/b][/h3]
[previewyoutube=YZoCy3F4J_A;full][/previewyoutube]
[h3][b]The fan-favorite monster Mizutsune is here![/b][/h3]
[img]{STEAM_CLAN_IMAGE}/44795648/b29776f3115c32e30de541ac24dde96fe7a9afde.jpg[/img]
Mizutsune, a Leviathan with a sleek, lithe body, is the unrivaled master of bubbles. Gear up for a hunt that's as elegant as a dance. A challenging 8★ Tempered Mizutsune will also be joining the fray!
Get ready to experience how this series fan-favorite is brought to life in Monster Hunter Wilds!
Note: Once you've reached HR 21 or higher, an extra mission will become available after talking to Kanya in the Scarlet Forest.

[h3][b]Zoh Shia rises once more![/b][/h3]
[img]{STEAM_CLAN_IMAGE}/44795648/2626d64c18dbd8b27bb86880bf2caca9ab923a35.jpg[/img]
Zoh Shia is now available as a repeatable quest!
To get Zoh Shia to appear, you'll need to complete a specific new mission that unlocks at HR 50. Once you've completed it, Zoh Shia will have a low chance of appearing in the Ruins of Wyveria during the Wyvern's Wakening environment state (check the Environment Overview) and can be made into a quest!

[h3][b]Arch-tempered Rey Dau strikes in an event quest![/b][/h3]
[img]{STEAM_CLAN_IMAGE}/44795648/ad0ec0f9bbe557ea419aadaf4cc8aaf9df458470.jpg[/img]
Brace yourself for Arch-tempered monsters, stronger and fiercer than their tempered counterparts! In Free Title Update 1, an Arch-tempered Rey Dau will be available in an event quest starting April 30. If you're a hunter with HR 50 or higher and the skills to match, then get ready for this challenging hunt!

[h3][b]Travel to the Grand Hub![/b][/h3]
[img]{STEAM_CLAN_IMAGE}/44795648/3707d471e0dd7d2db854232eb39b4eb167fec4a8.jpg[/img]
The Grand Hub is a vibrant space where hunters can unite, share stories, and interact in exciting new ways.
The Squad Information Counter will relocate from the Windward Plains to the Grand Hub once travel to the area has been unlocked, allowing you to conveniently manage your squads.
Note: Once you've reached HR 16 or higher, the Grand Hub can be unlocked by talking to Tetsuzan in the upper area of Suja, Peaks of Accord.


[h3][b]Celebrate the season with the Festival of Accord: Blossomdance event, releasing on April 23![/b][/h3]
[img]{STEAM_CLAN_IMAGE}/44795648/27fe4653d8e765ad380d5dd719cb590ccc3df376.jpg[/img]
Event Time: April 23 - May 6 (UTC)

During seasonal events, the Grand Hub's decorations and meals change to fit the season, and you'll also be able to obtain unique equipment, gestures, camp decorations, and more!
In addition to seasonal event quests, most of the past event quests will be re-released, so stay tuned for more hunts coming your way!

Additionally, an update featuring a collaboration with a Capcom title, along with other new features, adjustments, and fixes, is planned for the end of May. After that, Free Title Update 2 is set for release around summer. Further details will be announced soon, so please stay tuned for more information!
[img]{STEAM_CLAN_IMAGE}/44795648/bc43c757ce4d926c106e5f033418db80eddeccae.jpg[/img]
[hr][/hr]
Thank you for your support and we hope you enjoy Monster Hunter Wilds!
For any questions, please visit our support portal:
View frequently asked questions here:
https://www.monsterhunter.com/support/wilds/en/top

newsitems.title: Monster Hunter Wilds Showcase on March 25th
newsitems.author: capcomjapan_marketing
newsitems.contents:
Hunters! Join us on Tuesday March 25th at 7:00AM PDT / 14:00 GMT for a Monster Hunter Wilds Showcase stream, presented by Monster Hunter Wilds producer, Ryozo Tsujimoto!

The stream will be approximately 15 minutes with news on the next free title update that we're looking forward to sharing with you!

[previewyoutube=YZoCy3F4J_A;full][/previewyoutube]
Please note that actual stream time is subject to change.

https://www.monsterhunter.com/wilds/en-us


#MonsterHunter #MHWilds

https://discord.gg/capcom

https://www.facebook.com/monsterhunter

https://twitter.com/monsterhunter

https://www.instagram.com/monsterhuntergame/

https://www.youtube.com/monsterhunter


©CAPCOM

newsitems.title: Monster Hunter Wilds – Week One Community Message!
newsitems.author: MH Community
newsitems.contents:
Hey hunters,

How’s the hunting?

It’s been one week since the launch of Monster Hunter Wilds and we all stepped forth into the Forbidden Lands, marking the arrival of the next generation of the Monster Hunter series!

There’s been many moving parts as the team worked over launch weekend and beyond, collating feedback, addressing critical issues and more, so we’d like to take a moment to share a few updates with you, both on the celebratory side, as well as acknowledging feedback from the community.

As we’re continuing to collate, analyse and process the player feedback and reports, we won’t be going into the finer details today, but we hope what we can share right now is helpful!


[h1]Launch Milestones![/h1]

First up, let’s celebrate some cool milestones! We wanted to share our immense gratitude for your support during launch week, seriously, thank you all so much from everyone on the Monster Hunter team, you rock!

Thanks to you, the Steam community, Monster Hunter Wilds became Capcom’s most successful PC launch to date with a truly massive concurrent player count of 1,384,608, putting the game in Steam top 5 games of all-time for concurrent players. By comparison, Monster Hunter: World had a peak of 334,684, so that’s quite the jump!

[img]{STEAM_CLAN_IMAGE}/44795648/b231ebfb169ed52e7988e47feeaea448c10ead75.jpg[/img]

Monster Hunter Wilds also hit a milestone of over 8 million copies sold across all platforms in just the first three days following launch, which has left us truly humbled by such amazing support.

This is just the start for the next generation of Monster Hunter, and we look forward to taking the next steps with you.


[h1]Patches, Fixes and Community Feedback[/h1]

Speaking of next steps, let’s talk about what we’ve addressed since launch, and what’s next on the community feedback front.

Since launch, you’ve probably seen us deploy a couple of patches that addressed priority issues such as:
[list]
[*]Progression blockers
[*]Game stability
[*]Gameplay bugs
[/list]
These were, in the grand scheme of things, relatively quick fixes, allowing us to move quickly and address them thanks to player reports.

The team are currently working through other known issues, including network errors, crash issues and more.

A list of currently known issues can be found [url=https://www.monsterhunter.com/support/wilds/en/faq/detail/060]HERE[/url].


[b]Community Feedback[/b]

As previously mentioned, the team have been meticulously going through player feedback here on the Steam forums, in Steam reviews, social media channels, community hubs and more.

We’ve been collating everything we’re seeing, from the positive, to constructive and negative. This includes current community hot topics too.

Whilst we’re not quite ready to talk in more detail about this today, we wanted to reassure you that we’re watching, listening and working away behind the scenes. When we have more news to share with you, we will!

Thank you for your patience, support and feedback in the meantime!


[h1]What’s Next?[/h1]

As we previously mentioned, launch really is just the start for the next generation of Monster Hunter!

The game’s first two free Event Quests are live now, giving you the opportunity to craft an adorable new piece of headgear, as well as stock up on your Kunafa Cheese supplies! More Event Quests will be released on a regular basis moving forward, so keep a look out for them. If you’d like to see what’s coming in the next few weeks, you can do so with our Event Quest info page [url=https://info.monsterhunter.com/wilds/event-quest/en-us/schedule]HERE[/url].

[img]{STEAM_CLAN_IMAGE}/44795648/5104d0c66917d242e14287154c76bac4ecf1b95a.jpg[/img]

We’ve also announced our first two free Title Updates, aptly named Title Update 1 and Title Update 2, which will bring even more content to the game!

[img]{STEAM_CLAN_IMAGE}/44795648/bb56ba26fe9d8d4b989c37bc6370ab56868f0a04.jpg[/img]

We recently revealed that Title Update 1 will be arriving early April and shared a little bit about what new content you’ll be receiving. Check it out below:

[b]A New Level of Challenge![/b]

Prepare your gear, and resolve, hunters! TU1 will bring with it a monster of formidable strength at a level above Tempered!

Another challenging monster will also await you!

[img]{STEAM_CLAN_IMAGE}/44795648/f7c0074e8d1f95a0a5715562aa6958322a0820f1.jpg[/img]

[b]A Place to Gather![/b] 

A new place to meet, communicate, have meals together and more with other hunters will be added to Monster Hunter Wilds in TU1!

This area will be available to hunters who have completed the main story, so get hunting and be ready!

[img]{STEAM_CLAN_IMAGE}/44795648/781cadb4a7474ee4233d35e72876fb6b09f57a25.jpg[/img]


[h1]Quest Complete – We’ll see you next time![/h1]

That wraps up today’s post! Thank you again for your incredible support since launch.

We’ll see you in the Wilds.

- The Monster Hunter Community Team
